enableMassiveDamageCheck.name: Enable Massive Damage Check
enableMassiveDamageCheck.hint: Enable the feature that triggers a Constitution saving throw and potential exhaustion when damage is greater than or equal to half the creature's max HP in a single hit.

enableHealingFromZeroHP.name: Enable Healing from 0 HP
enableHealingFromZeroHP.hint: Enable the feature that adds a level of exhaustion when a creature is healed from 0 HP.

enableMassiveDamageAtZeroHP.name: Enable Massive Damage at 0 HP
enableMassiveDamageAtZeroHP.hint: Enable the feature that triggers a death saving throw failure and potential exhaustion when a creature takes massive damage at 0 HP.

baseSaveDC.name: Base Save DC
baseSaveDC.hint: Define the base save DC for the saving throw.

saveAbility.name: Saving Throw Ability
saveAbility.hint: Select the ability used for the saving throw.

flankingBonusType.name: Flanking Bonus Type
flankingBonusType.hint: Choose whether flanking provides a flat bonus or advantage.

flankingFlatBonus.name: Flanking Flat Bonus
flankingFlatBonus.hint: Define the flat bonus for flanking if the flat bonus type is selected.

enableFlankingExtraCheck.name: Enable Flanking Extra Check
enableFlankingExtraCheck.hint: Enable the extra check to ensure flanking is not applied if the target was just attacked by the flanking attacker.
